description: Create, update and delete a resource group.

force.description: Remove a resource group and all associated resources. Use with state 'absent' to delete a resource group that contains resources.

tags.description: Dictionary of string:string pairs to assign as metadata to the object. Metadata tags on the object will be updated with any provided values. To remove tags set append_tags option to false.

append_tags.description: Use to control if tags field is canonical or just appends to existing tags. When canonical, any tags not found in the tags parameter will be removed from the object's metadata.

ad_user.description: Active Directory username. Use when authenticating with an Active Directory user rather than service principal.

state.description: Assert the state of the resource group. Use 'present' to create or update and 'absent' to delete. When 'absent' a resource group containing resources will not be removed unless the force option is used.

secret.description: Azure client secret. Use when authenticating with a Service Principal.

location.description: Azure location for the resource group. Required when creating a new resource group. Cannot be changed once resource group is created.

client_id.description: Azure client ID. Use when authenticating with a Service Principal.

password.description: Active Directory user password. Use when authenticating with an Active Directory user rather than service principal.

tenant.description: Azure tenant ID. Use when authenticating with a Service Principal.
